Name: Dungeon Pain Maniac
About the game: DPM: Dungeon Pain Maniac is an 8-bit game for true fans of hardcore platformers. Only the chosen few will manage to complete the game, and the rest will burn with hatred. There are no save or checkpoint in Dungeon Pain Maniac. Spent all lives? - Start over ... Ragequitted? - Start over ... Went the wrong way? - Start over ... Power went out in your house? - Start over ... In Dungeon Pain Maniac there are many traps and secrets lying in wait for you at every turn. Thrown by the will of destiny into the dungeon filled with deadly traps, you will have nothing but your skill to rely upon. Do you think you have what it takes to escape?
